 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂקַר‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==ogle== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סְקַר‎</span> ***look at*** ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[Job.20.9|Job 20:9]]; [[Job.28.7|Job 28:7]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַקְרָנִית‎</span> ***looking about, ogling***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***eye*** with envy or hatred (e.g. [[1Sam.18.9|1Sam 18:9]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]); compare [[BDB#De|De]]<sup>Is</sup>); — ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׂקְּרוֺת עֵינַיִם‎</span> [[Isa.3.16|Isa 3:16]] ***ogling of eyes*** (women of Jerusalem). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂרר‎</span>.
